steps: 1. Pour the cooled material into a pre-prepared mold with dimensions of 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.
2. Allow the material to set for 24 hours at room temperature.
3. Once set, remove from the mold and sand the edges to achieve a smooth finish.
4. Optionally, seal the surface with an appropriate sealant to prevent oxidation.
